ygData.subject: SoW and Selos
ygData.msgSnippet: ... incidently, if you have broken SoW with selos, zoning will fix SoW, as long as the selos isn t active (with the icon showing) when you zone. klamot - bard
ygData.messageBody:
>> Druids in wolf form naturally run at SoW, but cannot cast SoC
>> on themselves. I'm curious what happens if you're grouped
>> with a druid in wolf form and you play Accelerando.
>You end up with a very slow moving wolf when Selos stops. :) I
>tested this with a druid friend of mine last night. Too bad...

incidently, if you have broken SoW with selos, zoning will fix SoW, as
long as the selos isn't active (with the icon showing) when you zone.

klamot - bard of fennin ro
